author: wn.com
title: Know your rights to time off work when your child is sick, says TUC (TUC ...
text: ( Source : TUC - Trades Union Congress ) s temperatures begin to drop and the cough and cold season falls upon us, the TUC is today (Wednesday) reminding working parents about their rights to take time off work to look after their children
